name: Accept Bitcoin instantly via Neutronpay
author: Neutronpay

sections.installation:
1. Install the WooCommerce Neutronpay plugin:
    • Install through WordPress Plugin Manager: Admin » Plugins » Add New » Enter “neutronpay woocommerce” in search » Click “Install Now”
    • Upload ZIP: Admin » Plugins » Add New » Upload Plugin
    • Extract ZIP and upload extracted directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ through FTP
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter API Credentials to WooCommerce-Neutron-Pay Plugin Settings: Admin » WooCommerce » Click on Payments tab » Find “Neutronpay” in Payment Gateways table » Click “Settings”
  4. Check “Enable Cryptocurrency payments via Neutronpay” checkbox.
sections.description:
Start accepting Bitcoin and Bitcoin Lightning today. Powered by Neutronpay

Neutronpay for WooCommerce

This plugin allows stores that use WordPress WooCommerce shopping cart system to accept Bitcoin and Bitcoin Lightning via Neutronpay.

Features

  • Payment amount is calculated using real-time exchange rates.
  • Allows for fee-less and instant Bitcoin payments through Lightning Network.
  • Supports traditional on-chain transactions using SegWit and native SegWit addresses (bech32)
  • No setup or recurring fees.
  • Free Lightning Network and scheduled withdrawals.

In order to use this plugin you have to create an account on https://neutronpay.com
